#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
#include <math.h>
typedef long long ll;
 
 /*fast power function from geeksforgeeks*/
ll power(ll x,int y)
{
    ll temp;
    if( y == 0)
        return 1;
    temp = power(x, y/2);
    if (y%2 == 0)
        return temp*temp;
    else
        return x*temp*temp;
}

bool binCheck(ll n,int b)
{
	double no=pow(n,1/(double)b);
	ll val=no;
	if(power(val,b)==n || power(val+1,b)==n)   //power(val+1) because pow function may return a value like 24.98745 (to make it 25)
	return true;
	else
	return false;
}

int main(void) {
	int t,b;
	ll n,a,i;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		b=(int)log2(n);
		for(i=2;i<=b;i++)
		{
			if(binCheck(n,i)==true)
			{
				printf("YES\n");
				break;
			}
		}
		if(i==b+1)
		{
			printf("NO\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
